short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful LinkedIn CRM & Automation Platform - Auto Connect and Send Bulk Messages on LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine having a personal assistant for LinkedIn that handles your lead generation, social selling, and connection requests automatically. 

Nemo is an all-in-one CRM and marketing/sales automation software designed specifically for LinkedIn users. It offers features like auto-connect with personalization, automated bulk messaging, and campaign management.

Nemo automates your manual actions and saves a lot of your time. It works seamlessly with LinkedIn Free and Premium accounts. This tool simplifies social selling for sales professionals, marketers, and recruiters, providing a more efficient way to manage your LinkedIn activities.

With Nemo, you can:

- Automatically send personalized connection requests to 2nd and 3rd level connections.
- Bulk message hundreds of 1st level connections.
- Create and manage multiple campaigns and audiences separately.
- Get monthly reports on dashboard

To learn more about Nemo or get in touch, visit their website at thenemo.co or email support@thenemo.co
